introduction: Hello! My name is Murilo Ferreira and I am a developer. I have extensive experience in development, as well as in creating interactive and engaging games. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills.
more_info_description: I have a solid background in programming and a passion for creating memorable digital experiences. Additionally, I am well-versed in several programming languages, including Java, C++, and Python. I also have a good understanding of UX/UI design principles, allowing me to create intuitive and pleasant user interfaces.
Um jogo inovador que oferece uma experiê: An innovative game that offers an immersive and fun experience.
Website desenvolvido com tecnologias mod: Website developed with modern technologies to provide the best user experience.
Projeto focado em soluções de software e: Project focused on efficient and scalable software solutions.
about_me_description: Hello, my name is Murilo, and I have been a developer for 4 years. I have worked with web development, and now I focus on web game development in the gambling area.
game_skill_1: Expertise in Unity, Phase 2 and 3, Pixi.js
web_skill_1: Experience with React, Vue.js, and other JS/TS libraries
web_skill_2: Building responsive and accessible web interfaces
experience_jogo_global_description: Development of games on web platforms in the gambling style using React, TypeScript, and Pixi.js.
experience_tda_description: Development of a web system using Vue.js and Vuetify.
experience_solvian_description: Development of systems to manage sensors and create service orders.
education_anhembi: Anhembi Morumbi - Postgraduate in Digital Games
